## Tools

- Taxonomic classification system [{{< fa toolbox >}} Kraken 2](https://ccb.jhu.edu/software/kraken2/)
- Filtering, mapping and OTU picking [{{< fa toolbox >}} SortMeRNA](https://bioinfo.lifl.fr/RNA/sortmerna/)
- Compare sequence similarity between datasets [{{< fa toolbox >}} SourMash](https://sourmash.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)
- Taxonomy quantitation / Community profiling [{{< fa toolbox >}} MetaPhlAn 2](https://huttenhower.sph.harvard.edu/metaphlan2/)
- Functional quantitation [{{< fa toolbox >}} HUMAnN 2](https://huttenhower.sph.harvard.edu/humann2/)
